title: Northern Territory Contact. No. 04
creator_credit: Ian Walker, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: The treasure-trove of Aboriginal rock-painting in Kakadu National Park reveals various styles of painting, from early ‘stick drawings’ to the later ‘x-ray’ style. Discusses the problems of protection and preservation of the paintings.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Walker, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
